 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּשׁ‎</span> **noun [masculine]** [[Job.35.15|Job 35:15]] si vera lectio from √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פשׁשׁ‎</span> (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***weak*** in mind or body, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***very stupid***); — i.e. folly; but read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֶּשַׁל‎</span> ([[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Theod|Theod]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Di|Di]] [[BDB#Bae|Bae]]<sup>Kau</sup> [[BDB#Du|Du]]).
